summary: Tiffany is a Nord Hunter. She primarily uses a bow, but is also skilled with two one handed weapons.
descriptionHtml:
~~~ KNOWN ISSUES ~~~
WILL NOT WORK WITH Hair packs of TES IV Oblivion for Female Only LATEST UPDATE YET!
I\'ll fix this when I\'m in the mood to fix things up. If you updated Oblivion hairs for skyrim, I suggest deactivating this mod until I fix it up.

~~~ Info ~~~
-Non Replacer NPC Follower
-Marriageable
-Comes with Hide armor (No Helmet), Hunting Bow of Frost, 1,000 Steel Arrows, 2 Steel Daggers
-Scales in level (Min 5, Max 81)
-Located in Nightgate Inn. (West of Forsaken Cave)

Perks: Agile Defender, Critical Shot, Stealth, Overdraw

Combat Style: Stealth Archer


~~~ Required ~~~
Hair packs of TES IV Oblivion for Female Only by radioragae 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18110
The file you need for it to work, is Oblivionhairs 06

~~~ Recommended ~~~
To make her look like I have her, I use:

DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709

Coverwomen by mrLenski
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563
Look #1

Brows by lthot
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30411

The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722

~~~ Story ~~~
Tiffany, grew up with her mother, in a small house that was located around Nightgate Inn. She never knew her father as she was growing up, and for the longest time, all she could remember about him is that he was big and strong. Her mother told her stories of her father. Stories about how great a warrior he was, tales of his battles, and how he saved her. She might not have known her father well, but he was her idol, and she wanted to grow up to be an adventurer like him. At the age of 6, Tiffany started to learn how to use a bow, and how to hunt. On her 15th birthday, a group of bandits raided the house Tiffany lived in, burning it to the ground. Tiffany managed to escape, but her mother did not. After this event, Tiffany was forced to move to Nightgate Inn, and stay there. After a few weeks, she met her father again, for the first time, in what seemed like ever. Her father taught her more of combat, gave her some new clothing, and her mother\'s bow. Her father then disappeared again. Now Tiffany waits at Nightgate Inn, for someone to travel with.



~~~ Updates ~~~
Version 1.00: Created, tested a bit, and uploaded.
Version 1.05: Added Face Gen Data, AI Package, Changed Perks.

~~~ Credits ~~~
dimon99 for UNP
radioragae for Oblivion Hair Packs
mrLenski for Coverwomen
natilde for making me try to make a female follower with custom hairs (Even though I didn\'t follow their guide)
My Boyfriend
author: Fantil Swift
